# IKRig.Constraint.IKPositionDemand.Mode.reach

**Case**

A mode which uses the set position target.

## Declaration

```swift
case reach
```

## Discussion

You can use this in cases like a wrist joint that needs to be at a set position.
title: IKRig.Constraint.IKPositionDemand.Mode.reach
